attributes.action: create cheaper housing for first time buyers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: These days there are many homes available for the elderly (those past retirement age) at a much lower price. However first time buyers aer still struggling to be able to get onto the property ladder. I believe that there should be homes built for first time buyers in a similar way which they are built for those who are now past retirement age.

reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
